It also works great on picking up dog hair which is helpful since I have three. Thinking about getting a second one for the upstairs floor of my home!

I like that the robot has good battery life and seems like it could be able to clean my whole apartment, but I don‚Äôt like that it says it is stuck all the time. I check on it and it‚Äôs sitting in the middle of the room. There‚Äôs no objects or furniture near it. It also seems to not work as well when the lights are off which is annoying because I want it to run while I am at work. I have not had a successful run yet. I‚Äôm attempting it for the fourth time and am considering sending it back.

I‚Äôve wanted one of these little gadgets for years but couldn‚Äôt afford the big name brand one. This little guy is awesome! I run it a couple of times a day. Nice to walk into the house and have a freshly vacuumed floor. I figured out that the roller needs cleaned out everyday but it‚Äôs easier. I wish the dust bin emptied out a little differently but all in all I am in love with this product!

Had the roomba i3 before this one and it is hands down better than the roomba. App is a little funky, can‚Äôt create boundaries unless you put down magnetic strip. We just close the door as a work around. It will detect a step so that‚Äôs good. Overall it was a good purchase and it does have good suction

Review_title: Best purchase I have ever made!
Product_review: This vacuum is the best purchase I have ever made on Amazon. Truly an amazing machine. I was skeptical at first, that any robotic vacuum could do as good a job as I could by hand, but I was wrong. This little guy doesn't miss a spot. The way it maneuvers around corners and furniture is absolutely incredible.

Review_title: Takes the work out of vacuuming
Product_review: I love this! I have waist length hair and it is no challenge for the Roborock E4. It does get tangled on the brush roller and the sweeper, but it's worth cleaning up to not have hair everywhere. I've vacuumed my entire house three times and it takes less than an hour and a half for a 1450 sq ft house. The first two times it picked up an enormous amount of hair, so hopefully, it will continue to be the beast I believe it is! Very impressed. I wish it had mapping but I'm ok with it not having it for the money I saved! I'd definitely buy it again!

Review_title: Awesome vacuum, especially for pet hair
Product_review: We have a large dog that sheds a lot. This vacuum does very well with pet hair pickup. Only recommendation I have is to empty the bin often, even before it tells you to as it will do a better job at cleaning.
Smart and fast
There seems to be a design flaw. It is always telling me to clean the filter, even 5 minutes after it's been cleaned. However, it works very good.

¬†I have been pleasantly suprised at how well this vacuum works. I have never had one and honestly felt more like its a gimmick. However, we do have dogs and this thing has really helped. I run it everyday in the main areas and couple times a week in the bedroom and bath. Even my wife has been impressed. Very satisfied with the results.

Review_title: We named ours Charlie and it‚Äôs pretty much family!
Product_review: This little thing has changed everything for us. We have two large dogs that shed ALOT. We looked into vacuums to help keep the house clean and landed on the E4.

¬†It‚Äôs convenient but I‚Äôve noticed the suction is not that good since I can still see the hair, dusts and other particles on the floor after the robot has swept through it multiple times, so I can‚Äôt really imagine what it‚Äôs left out that isn‚Äôt visible.

I‚Äôm very impressed with this little robot. I‚Äôm even more impressed with customer support. I called without knowing it was after hours since I was having trouble connecting it to my wifi. I didn't leave a message, but a representative called me back anyway about a half hour before they were suppose to be open. She walked me though it simple enough. I‚Äôm shocked. She really wanted me to be satisfied with the product. And now I am.

Review_title: Good vacuumer, really happy I got it
Product_review: Had been hesitant to buy one of these, is it really worth the money? The answer is clearly yes - the E4 cleans our house daily, navigates around 5 rooms effectively and the kids are now used to picking up their toys every day, as otherwise "WALL-E" eats them...

Review_title: Smart, intuitive and does it's job really well.
Product_review: Great vacuum, I'm so happy. It ready does learn the rooms and more well in an organized manner to cover every inch of the floor. It took a little while to get the ap connected to the machine but after a few tries it works perfect. It finds its way back home to charge when it needs to, and then continues where it left off. I got it so I would never have to Mop again, but I still haven't taken time to figure out yet. I'll update the review once I Mop with it. So far it's worth it just sweeping.

I bought and returned an iRobot Roomba 675 and this vacuum is 100% better. It does actually ‚Äúthink‚Äù about its pattern and obstacles. The roomba ran into things aggressively and got caught on every single cord. This machine is great, especially for the price. It‚Äôs battery does run down fairly quickly if you have any rugs.

Review_title: A must have for all pet owners
Product_review: I used to vacuum every other day to get my dog hair from getting everywhere. If I did not do this, I used to see bunched up hair all over the floor. One of issues with regular vacuum is hair getting under the furniture such as bed or couch, that are difficult to move to clean underneath. This little robot solved all my hair problems! I run this unit each of my floors every day, and in about an hour, all the visible dog hair are gone! I should have purchased this a long time ago.

I rarely write a review. That said, I felt I needed to because this vacuum is great. We have a finished basement with Berber carpet. Having two dogs (one is a shepherd) we have some dog hair and kids who can‚Äôt seem to eat chips without leaving tons of crumbs. Before we had an old rumba from Costco and was hesitant on this purchase. This is a serious upgrade. It actually vacuums in straight lines and keeps track of where it‚Äôs been. Not some random wandering. Great vacuum for the money.

I really like this product so far. I cannot leave it a 5 star review though as it leaves behind the occasional piece of debris or string that I feel it should have picked up. But the dustbin does not lie it is clearly working.
On day one, so far, I had to rescue it twice! First it stuck on an area rug and rolled the rug up

Review_title: I gave it as a gift.
Product_review: I gave this to my daughter as a gift. It replaced another brand which stopped working and bounced around randomly. She likes this new one for its ability to deal with lots of dog hair, speed of cleaning and the nice "mowed lawn" pattern it leaves behind.

It doesn't have all the bells and whistles some of the more expensive brands have, but ot gets the job done. I'm yet to figure out how to get it to leave my dining room, so I just pick it up and take it from room to room. This might be a pain, but for the price, I knew it wasn't going to be perfection. It's a nice helper.

Review_title: It works if you get the crap off the floor. If you have pets, its amazing. clean offten
Product_review: Large house with capeting. No. Moderate size house with hardwood. Perfect. Buy if you have a pet and area rugs. Finds hair that you would not believe. Keep small crap off the floor, Nylons/tights, panties, and small flexible clothing. It does its best to cover the floor space, Empty often.

Review_title: Great Robot vacuum but little noisy.
Product_review: ¬†Roborock runs a great pattern back and forth never missing a line ,it has 3 settings for suction but is a little loud even on medium power when running over rugs it picks up suction power also finishes all edges around each room , we run ours threw Alexa !!
it does work very well, but we had problems due to the bad internet connection we have here so use the wi-fi and program it so we start it manually, it works well!!

Review_title: It only worked correctly the first 3 times I used it!!
Product_review: ¬†I bought this a couple of months ago. The first 3 times I used it I was happy with the results, it was picking up a lot of dust. From the 4th time, I noticed that I was getting less and less dust in the bin after cleaning. I have used it for a total of 10 h of cleaning now and it doesn't seem to be cleaning anymore the carpet. I can easily see residues on the floor after it finishes (see video). Even in the kitchen where there is no carpet is not very clean. I had to clean again with my old vacuum after its horrible job. Highly disappointed. This is probably the worst purchase I have ever made. I wish I had use it enough from the beginning so I could return it on time.

Review_title: I do not want to replace this vacuume .
Product_review: This vacuum just runs over the same place over and over, in a straight line, I had one before this and it went around the house real good but it stopped working. I just want to return this one and order another one later that will work for me. I am in my 80 could you have someone pick this up for me. Charlene Hatley

Debo decir que es una compra acertada 100%, muy pocas veces he usado la aplicaci√≥n y realmente no se requiere a no ser que vayas a poner a hacer la limpieza estando fuera de casa. Tenemos un gato y la cantidad de pelo que recoge es impresionante, con una escoba nunca se recog√≠a tanto mugre. Compr√© el tanque de trapeado y es muy √∫til a medida que va limpiando va haciendo el trepaeado. El control remoto no es muy funcional pero considero que no se requiere. Si necesitas limpiar solo una zona, solo basta con cerrar puertas y/o poner alguna barrera como una silla o una caja y listo. Sin complicaciones y muy funcional.

Great battery life. I‚Äôm getting two hours of cleaning. Different cleaning speeds. From queit to turbo. Cleans in a ‚Äúz‚Äù pattern it makes sure to catch all the areas. Can control thru app with remote direction. Highly recommended! The app won‚Äôt pair with Alexa. Skill page just sits and won‚Äôt connect.

Review_title: Great unit ! Itself without the mopping feature!
Product_review: This unit in and of itself is very good and pleased with overall performance. I found the 45.00 mopping attachment to be a waste of money as even in gentle mopping mode dry streaks appeared in track of robot so essentially it does not effectively mop a hardwood or tile floor.

Review_title: No offense to robots but this one is dumb and blind
Product_review: Dumbest robot ever. It can‚Äôt even find his docking station when it‚Äôs just a few feet away without obstacles. I have a Roborock S5 Max at home and she‚Äôs a genius. One of the best investments for my home so I decided to get this entry level version for my office. Complete waste of money. I have it scheduled for nightly vacuums for a little over 2 weeks and it‚Äôs completed cleaning just once. Maybe mine is defective but it seems it doesn‚Äôt have any ‚Äúsight‚Äù at all and it doesn‚Äôt have the ‚Äúbrains‚Äù to at least use process of elimination.

Review_title: So frustrating. Stupid Vac, not Smart.
Product_review: This vacuum was unbelievably frustrating. It couldn't figure out that it missed rooms. It wedged itself under the couch, reversed out, went over 2 inches, and wedged itself under it again. It did this for 20 minutes. I was so aggravated that I returned it.

We purchased the vacuum mop hoping to clean up after our two toddlers. The vacuum works just fine, but the mop is disappointing. There is just a moist pad that you attach to the vacuum, no spray or scrubbing. The pad wets the floor but that‚Äôs about it. It doesn‚Äôt scrub up any mess.

Purchased this thinking it would fail in a house with 2 dogs, 2 cats, 4 birds. Boy was I wrong! This vac is worth every penny. Picks up not only hair, but feathers, seed and cat litter. Have had for nearly 2 months. Run it 1x daily without any issues. App is easy to setup and use.
Wow! Okay. So this vacuum has been a great surprise! I was obviously skeptical about it due to the price difference between this and the Roomba and I need to say, I‚Äôm so glad i gave it a shot!

Review_title: Where is the map of your house!?
Product_review: The vacuum it‚Äôs self it‚Äôs good. The only reason why I gave it a 2 star rating is because it doesn‚Äôt map out your house like people are showing. I can find that option in the app. I find it a little deceiving.

Great robo vacuum with a good mobile app. Battery lasts long enough to clean entire floor which is about 900 square feet. It's thin enough to go under most of our furniture. It does get "lost" occasionally and can't find it's way back to the charger, but not often. Planning to buy a "smarter" Roborock for upstairs.

I think this is fantastic! Really does a great job getting up the debris on the floors and navigating around my furniture. Easy to set up and link to alexa. Cuts the floor cleaning efforts by a ton. I HATE cleaning my floors. The mop attachment is also really useful. Used it 1 time so far after I mopped and the pad got the leftover stuff. I no longer stress about vacuuming after company leaves. Just turn this little bugger on and let it do the cleaning for me!

I am very pleased with this entry level robo vacuum. It is perfect for an everyday sweep of dog hair. Had I to do it again, I would have started with a higher model that allows me to define room areas and starting points. I‚Äôm happy with the low sound too ‚Äî my dogs are fine with it.

Works great app was very easy setting up cleans well. You have to take care of this machine. Clean regularly, empty and change filters every two to three months. They also sell a brush kit at a great value. Order one when buying this great vacuum.

I have ceramic tile floors and a couple of throw rugs. It works great as far as cleaning. It does seem to get confused sometimes. It‚Äôs still learning the layout of my house I guess. When I first was setting it up it kept saying not finding my WiFi even though it did. I had to close out the app and reopen it and it was there. Overall it does a good job cleaning. It does get stuck under my dresser sometimes and the little rubber feelers got tangled in one of my shag area rugs so I just vacuum that myself now.

I'm in love! I pored over reviews and product comparisons before settling on this robo-vacuum. I'm so happy with my purchase. We have a very active home between kids and pets and this vacuum has revolutionized my floor care. I went from sweeping 3 times a day to... Never! The suction is great, it's not too loud to run during naptime, and it cleans so much more than I ever anticipated.

Works as intended following a pattern. Nice cleaning in porcelain floor. It cleans my hair and the pets hair. I have a Roomba, and the Roomba is noisy and crazy. In the future I will buy the expensive one, since I know this brand is worthy.

Review_title: Suction is great but can‚Äôt add app
Product_review: Love the suction and more organized way it cleans. BUT I have yet been able to add the app.

It has done a decent job keeping the dog hair swept up, and the dust down. It has a difficult time transitioning from wood floor to carpet, and some of the time can not do it. Best for wood floors, would not recommend for primary carpet.

For the money, this thing is unbeatable. I use it only on hardwood but it zips around extremely quickly and has very strong suction power. It jumps on top of and over mats and even legs of chairs. This thing is unstoppable and very effective. Zero pet hair remains anywhere. Great product.

Was working fine, now won't charge, keeps giving me "error 13". Roborock says because I live in Alaska I have to pay to send it to them to repair. Ummm, that is not in the purchase information. And I shouldn't have to have something repaired that I bought only a few months ago anyway! Try another brand.

Recommend. Looked and reviewed many items, I was skeptical on these vacuums. I didn't want to spend a lot of money and be disappointed. We have dark hardwood floors. Does a great job. Still moving items to avoid it getting stuck. Wish the tray was a little bit bigger in the gathering section, seems to fill up every use. Still trying to find the best place for it's home base. Found myself looking to run this nightly - great coming downstairs and seeing floor clean.

Review_title: BUY IT! GREAT FOR DOG HAIR!
Product_review: If you are debating on purchasing this or not, just do it! This is one of my favorite purchases for our home. We have a German Shepherd dog who sheds like crazy so we are sure to run the vacuum every day but it works so well! Just when I think there‚Äôs no more hair to clean up, it‚Äôs still finds more. We are really impressed with the technology of this robotic vacuum with a low price point. It is much smarter than the cheapest roomba and still cheaper! It is easy to clean and we haven‚Äôt had any issues with clogging, hair wrapping around the wheels or anything like that!

Review_title: Perfect robot vaccum for those with pets!!!
Product_review: I llve everything about this vacuum. It REALLY works. However the remote control feature sucks. It rarely connects or recognizes it. However, I don't really need the remote feature, just a fast cleaning. I'd recommend this to anyone with pets!!! The brush never gets stuck or full like others.

I really like this little robot. It picks up a lot of stuff off the floor, fits easily under my kitchen cabinets and living room furniture. It is a little noisy but I just have it set to start cleaning at 6 am for a bonus alarm clock for me.
I had a robo vac years ago and was less than impressed so I wasn't getting my hopes up but this vaccine exceeded my expectations.

I was having issues getting it connected to wifi but then I just turned it on and it works fantastic on its own. I'm so happy that I finally bought this since I have 3 cats and mostly hardwood floors. I'll try to hook it to wifi again soon but at this point I don't need that feature.

Review_title: Product failed after just five uses and company refused to pay for shipping for repair.
Product_review: After using it just five times it stopped working and gave an Error 13 message which indicated the contacts need to be cleaned. The contacts were spotless, and cleaning them did not help. After several emails with the company they agreed to have it returned for repair, but they refused to pay for shipping since I live in Hawaii. They told me to contact Amazon. Amazon sent me a shipping label and refunded my money. I would not recommend this product or this company.
Not compatible with open wifi. Not compatible with 5g. Lost the bedroom echo dot setting this up.

Review_title: All in all better than all the Roombas that we have had over the years
Product_review: This vacuum is my new sidekick. It is quieter, bigger canister, more thorough (cleans in rows) and can handle rugs or solid floors with two automatic speeds. Better than Roomba and better than that last one that I don‚Äôt even remember the name. It stopped working in a month. We have birds, cats and dogs, excellent job on bird food as well as pet hair.

I returned mine for the next model up that does mapping to turn zones off. This one vacuums great but if you want a mop and have carpet it‚Äôs useless cuz it will spray your carpets with water I returned it for the 5S max which has the ability to turn off certain areas. If you just need a vacuum the S4 works great.

I bought this product to make life easier. It was such a disappointment. It said it was stuck when in the middle of a room, missed three rooms when all doors were open and no threshold to climb. It was supposed to do a room and then go around the perimeter, which it failed to do. I was going to purchase another for the downstairs that I will not do. This was very disappointing as I have a daughter who bought another model and is thrilled with it. Maybe because she is in an apartment versus my house. If I could return it for another model I would do so. Sadly, I bought it and was waiting for new carpet to use it and because of Covid it was delayed and my window to return is closed.

Easy to set up, Mi Home app was no problem, connected first time. This is my second Roborock vac. Purchased for finished basement, works better than I expected, it automatically adjusts from carpet to hardwood, very nice feature. Large dust bin, great battery life, i will be using the mop feature i am sure that will sk work great, perfect coverage, i love that it gets under the beds, great product way better than I expected for the price.

¬†This guy is awesome!!! We have 2 dogs... one being a husky üò£. I run this vacuum daily. It gets under furniture, precisely around it, it learns the floor plan... I love it!!! Perfect for pet hair. I researched many and this one won for price and performance. Highly recommend.

I had my doubts about how well this vacuum would work at getting pet hair out of the carpet and I was proved wrong. This thing is amazing and I‚Äôm so impressed with how well it cleans and the accuracy of the area it covers. This has definitely been my favorite purchase all year. I definitely recommend buying. I just want to vacuum all the time bc it‚Äôs so awesome, but I don‚Äôt need to bc it cleans so well!

I bought 1 that was giving me a hard time and acting crazy. Contacted support and was very helpful. Returned it and bought another one. This one is now awesome. Connected to phone with no problems. Thx
Terrilble app. Wouldn‚Äôt connect during setup - iOS & android same result. Robot doesn‚Äôt see dock even when it‚Äôs in plain sight. This thing is garbage. Going right back!

Review_title: Works better with a smart phone or tablet
Product_review: I bought this as a gift for a friend of mine. She is 78 years old and not very tech savvy. She has only been using a cell phone for about a year and that is a flip phone. While this unit does clean very well when you simply turn it on, it would be better if you could program it.

The 2 robot vacuums I have clean well-enough in between deeper cleanings with me canister vac. I usually run them at least 2 times a day. Despite having a larger dirt collection container than some competitors, it fills up way to quickly and I keep a clean house. I haven't used the Alexa integration yet

For the cost of this unit, I was hoping for something better. This unit doesn't tell you when the dust bin is full. It will fill up and leave piles of hair and dirt as it cleans. I have purchased the debot and the hoover, both were less than this unit and both did a better job cleaning.

Review_title: Could never get it to connect to app
Product_review: I tried many times to connect it to the app but nothing worked. I just use by clicking the button on the device and it cleans up great. I wish it would work with the app but that's okay for now, it works great for what its worth.

Review_title: MUST HAVE!! This is the best robo vacuum I‚Äôve seen!
Product_review: This thing is amazing especially for the price point, I have it scheduled to clean while me and my husband are at work everyday and it gets our hardwood floors so clean. It‚Äôs cleaned our sons carpeted bedroom and it does pretty well with that as well. HIGHLY recommend!! It also doesn‚Äôt randomly bounce around your house like cheaper options, it actually makes a z pattern and continues where it left off if it goes to recharge. Our floors have never been this clean! 10/10!!

I had an irobot before and once it memorized the path it was very efficient. This one is confused more often than not. Is not thorough. Gets stuck a lot. Remote control is useless. App doesn't do much. Not impressed.
Almost a year with this helper! Works great for everyday cleaning, not for deep cleaning.

Review_title: Good vacuum and mop, but ledge detection is not great.
Product_review: Vacuum and mop work well, but ledge detection is not great. It will fall into my shower if I don‚Äôt shut the door (6‚Äù drop). Also, it will go up-and-over the 1‚Äù wall on the sliding glass door frame and then get stuck.

Great basic automated vacuum, impressive suction power (actually sucked up a double A battery, don't think my Dyson could do that!). Very customizable for various power levels, cleaning frequencies and times. Easy to monitor and automate via app. Impressed with it so far.

Review_title: Buy it now!! It‚Äôs the best
Product_review: We have two big dogs who shed constantly and this thing is a dream! If we didn‚Äôt have this we would be vacuuming constantly but now the floors are always clean. It picks up so much that we have to empty it every other use but I‚Äôd gladly take that over daily vacuuming. It fits well under most things and it‚Äôs only gotten stuck once (under the dining table and chairs). I‚Äôve raved to everyone I know about how amazing this thing is. Highly recommend it!

I would run it, clean the tank, run it again, and it would still find more dirt and hair‚Äîmeaning it‚Äôs obviously not super strong suction. However, who cares? I just run it every day anyway so it doesn‚Äôt need to be perfect.
Super easy to use. Cleans well and learns floor layout well. We have three cats and run it daily (just need to empty the filter each night). Bought one as a gift for a family member as well!
Total waste of money, absolutely useless device, runs around in the same space,
Was unsure as I was not familiar with the company....very impressed with the ease of use and quality of this product! Very happy to have this robot vacuum! Love it!

Do not buy this product! after two months, last week started dropping Wi-Fi connection. Now it will not even reconnect, tried two different routers and even took it to a buddies house and tried to reconfigure it there. Two weeks outside my return window. What a big pile of crap this is!! I will be contacting seller to resolve it, supposed to have a 12 month limited warranty.

This is an amazing vaccum. I was lucky enough to have Adam V. of the Roborock support team help me sync it with my phone. I can actually start the cleaning from anywhere! I am so impressed that I recently purchased another for upstairs. Great purchase.
Don't care for the mop portion of it, but the vacuum has made my life easier. Having a Shiba Inu and her shedding made this vacuum worth the buy

Review_title: Cleans well but hard to pair with Alexa
Product_review: Cleans great. Very difficult to set up with Alexa but it can be done. Seems to work well once set up. Had to call the customer service number to get help. The instructions are very confusing!!!
I didn't sync the robot with the app, but it works great starting it up manually. I am very pleased with the performance of this machine. We named it Felix Unger, another great cleaner!

This is a really great vacuum. I love how it goes back and forth in a line instead of bouncing around. My only complaint is that it doesn‚Äôt have the spinning brush on both sides. It causes it to miss some stuff on the edges but this has been such a time saver with 2 young kids who love to get crumbs everywhere and a cat. It does a really good job with hair, cat food, litter, food crumbs, etc.

Review_title: Let it run a few times before judging its capability.
Product_review: First few runs were troublesome, finished too early and it missed a lot of area, had to restart it to get the coverage. Around the third try/day of cleaning it covered just about every square inch of accessible floor without issue. The issue could of been running it on balanced mode because it always gave up on the carpet areas, since running on turbo or max its been on point. I am impressed, and if it holds up over time I see no reason to spend more $ on a more advanced laser mapping bot.

Look for a budget & get the job done this is it . It maps out your house by itself once it does that you program it on what days you want it to clean & it will do it for you . It also works great from floor to carpet . My wife loves it & I do too

Review_title: Would not recommend unless you want to do the entire area
Product_review: Good suction power. Cannot find docking station. Goes over and over same areas and gets lost at times. Cannot choose to clean certain rooms instead of doing the entire first floor. If you move it is gets totally confused.
Love the vacuum, it did good job, but I had returned it due to not going back to dock after cleaning.

Goes in straight lines, thats the only good thing. It rubs against the baseboards so hard it screws up the paint. It gets stuck in rooms for no reason, and takes forever to find the dock if it actually finds it. Just stops vacuuming when it gets near the bounty strips, thats right,, it doesn't turn and go somewhere else, it stops sends you a message about a magnetic field and tells you to move the vacuum.. Wouldn't have bought it if I knew this. Junk.

I have a 2 bedroom hard wood floor apartment all on one level. I have 2 cats. This thing is a tank I love it. Runs 50-60 square meters in 60-80 mins usually. Empty dustbin every use. If you can grab it for 200 like I did it is worth every penny
Run this thing every morning. Have several dogs. Keeps things from getting out of hand. Really was impressed with it.

Review_title: Great little vacuum for surface cleaning.
Product_review: This little vacuum is great. Cleans edge to edge of every room. I lift and secure all cords and it cleans seamlessly, even under furniture. Picks up dirt and small debris.Cleans 1000 sq ft in about 90 minutes. Easy to set up the app and connect.

Review_title: Don‚Äôt buy if it‚Äôs made in China, unless you live in China.
Product_review: Make sure you DON‚ÄôT get one made in China or you won‚Äôt be able to use the app, since it‚Äôs only supported in Mainland China. I can start it manually but I can‚Äôt schedule it to start, check the battery, map out rooms, or anything that I was expecting to be able to do as described when I purchased it. It is louder than I expected, unless you run it while you‚Äôre watching TV, but not annoyingly loud. The suction is good, it picks up most of the crumbs and dog hair from the hardwood floors and area rug. Overall it‚Äôs a pretty good robot vacuum, just super disappointed about not being able to use it the way I bought it to use.

Review_title: Zero Suction, Will Leave Your Floors Dirty.
Product_review: Very unhappy, both the vacuum and the mop on this Roborock E4 are terrible. The vacuum won't pick up even the slightest crumb and the mop just soaks the floor. Do yourself a big favor and don't waste your money on this vacuum. Spend a little more and get a better brand.
I ordered two of these, the first one didn't do the whole floor and returned to dock.

SINCERAMENTE LEYENDO LOS COMENTARIOS NEGATIVOS, ESTABA ASUSTADA DE QUE FUERA A SALIR MAL LA COMPRA. SOY DE COSTA RICA, MI ENCARGO LLEG√ì BIEN Y EST√Å FUNCIONANDO EXCELENTE, ES UN GRAN AYUDANTE. LO RECOMIENDO.

Review_title: Vacuum Excellent; Mopping?  Better than nothing.
Product_review: I used to have a 600-series roomba. This thing blows it away. It's suction is much better, and it makes rows so the carpet looks very nice when done. It also has the mop attachment, which does not replace a real mop but it'sy better than nothing.

It does such a great job getting every inch of every room. I‚Äôm so impressed. I‚Äôve had another brand and it seemed to go over the same spots over and over and took forever. This robot goes in lines and gets under furniture and around anything blocking its way. Love!
This is a great little machine, had others but the thinness of this robovac is great, easily moves under furniture, love this little machine!!!
I was very skeptical about robot vacuums being able to really clean. It‚Äôs only been a few days, but I am highly impressed so far.

I had owned another brand and liked it, but I have a new dog and it couldn't pick up all of the hair. I have used this thing twice and my floors look great. It is very structured in how it works through the room. There is no random bumping around. It goes back and forth until it has reached the end, then it goes around the edges. It does this through multiple rooms. I am really happy that once it is done, my floors look clean.

Review_title: Great picker upper! Works on wood floor, carpet, area rugs!
Product_review: I love this vacuum! It has no issue with area rugs. You can hear the suction increase when it hits a rug. It can vacuum my 1st level which is 1300 Sq feet on one charge and is a mix of wood floor and carpet. Love how it can clean under my furniture; places I have a hard time getting to with a vacuum!

This roborock is so far a good product, cleans very well (except in corners), easy to clean and thorough. Does not intimidate my malti-poo, quiet and efficient, a bit on high-end priced. Would recommend.

Review_title: Good for the price and features
Product_review: Roborock E4 is a good vaccum cleaner. This vaccum has great suction power and larger bin as compared to others in similar price range. I wish the app was more intuitive with no-go zone and room dividers (which is the only reason for less rating). I know the high end have better mapping technology but I am happy with this one for my needs.

My first robot vacuum. I have two cats and a short haired dog. All hardwood floors. This works well as long as I run it every 2nd or 3rd day. It cleans in a good pattern and returns to the dock. I‚Äôm very impressed. This model doesn‚Äôt allow no go lines but magnetic tape solved my problem easily.

Review_title: This Robot does not seems to pick much up. Even with the power vacuum.
Product_review: My Roomba runs rings around this Roborock system. The Roborock is stuck all the time, barley picks anything up.

This a very cool machine. This is my first robot vacuum and it‚Äôs awesome to see this gadget in action. You turn it on, sit back and watch your favorite TV show and 30 min later (or less) your living room is vacuumed spotless. Innovation at its finest. I would just suggest moving chairs, furniture or cords out of the way. It is quiet, nimble and has a long battery life. Highly recommend

This thing is really, really bad. I almost never write reviews but I‚Äôve had it 6 months and came back just to write so others won‚Äôt get it. It hardly picks up anything and if it actually does, you have to immediately clean the roller and the sensors. It‚Äôs also extremely noisy and I think it‚Äôs found it‚Äôs way home without ‚Äúerroring‚Äù out once. I have since bought a Dyson Animal Ball (which is amazing) to make up where this one lacks. I‚Äôm prob going to just trash it. Save your money!

Review_title: Cheap Product and less amount refunded-Pls be aware
Product_review: The quality of the product is very cheap and the sensors dont work properly...it often struck in different places and even cant come out from some corners if struck....I returned it in two days and later realized that the seller refunded $40 less than I paid. Amazon customer care team helped me to get full refund. I strongly recommend to stay away from this product and seller.

It definitely works no issues with performance it does its job fine,just be aware it does get stuck under cupboards or couch etc,it really rams itself in there and can't get out..So if u plan on using this when away from the home id keep this in mind.

The vacuum is perfect! Just what I needed. It thinks for itself! I hovered like a hen to her chickens. I was amazed at how it worked! Now let it do its work! Smooth floors, short pile carpet, around chairs and tables. Where I ere these vacuums ten years ago! As a retired person this saves time and effort! Thank you!

It worked okay for a couple months. It really does a decent job vacuuming. I purchased mine on March 5th and as of May 25th it no longer charges. I reached out to Roborock support, but have not gotten any response or help.
0 stars worked great for a few months the. App stopped working and the robot stopped working shortly after
The suction is pretty great. We run it every night. It‚Äôs not super noise . The mopping is very light but if you do it every day you be pleased.

Review_title: Why did I wait so long?
Product_review: I never seriously considered getting one of these and then this popped up as deal of the day. One of the best purchases ever! "Margaret" cleans my whole house, if she gets tired, she will go take a nap/recharge and get back to work. She does an awesome job cleaning up after 2 cats and 2 dogs. We've had her for 5 months and still extremely happy. My mom tried a couple of the other brands and wasn't impressed with them, but Margaret roboRocks!

Review_title: Hesitated too long to buy one, should have done so sooner!
Product_review: This thing really sucks!! Wife is happy, floors are cleaner with less work. He‚Äôs kinda like a pet for the kids. They‚Äôve even named him.

Review_title: I wish I could return this! I wish Amazon was more like Costco in that sense
Product_review: Pathetic overall compared to S6 that I got last year. Loses its way, gets stuck everywhere, no map changes or anything to help it learn what not to do. Half of the times the vaccum is found stuck somewhere even as small as 1 inch hurdle around the carpet. Complete waste of money. I wish I could return this.

The battery life is great. There is no way to map where it goes (from the product review I was led to believe there was). It runs for 10 minutes and says ‚Äúplease remove obstacles‚Äù. The thing is there is never anything within 5 feet of it. I get the sense it‚Äôs not made to vacuum carpet

This is my first robotic vacuum and I‚Äôm happy with the purchase. I have a large dog who sheds a lot and this vacuum handles fur, dust, and dirt well. I have to dump the canister about once per cleaning of my approximately 700 sq ft apartment. It also seems to be pretty study. My 70lb dog stood on it a couple times after I first got it and it still works! I like the way it follows a linear pattern to cleaning and doesn‚Äôt ping pong around. It is significantly quieter than a normal vacuum. Don‚Äôt have any complaints.

This thing is amazing it works so well and it really pics up everything and doesn‚Äôt miss a spot the only down side is that it climes over my dinning room chairs metal bottoms and gets stuck I have no way to make it stop climbing over them and getting stuck

The mopping attachment and pads need to be purchased separately. It was not clear to connect to the internet but I did get it to operate - must follow the instructions precisely. It does not map or remember each room or your entire floor plan so the room function is only useful if you close off each room. It is much quieter than I expected and handles most conditions and materials well. Customer service is responsive via email but not through the app function.
We have a heavy shedder and having this run every night really cleans up the dog hair. Worth the hassle freeing from cords and string it gets tangled in

Review_title: I have been using it for a month, and so far I am very happy with it!
Product_review: I have low pile carpet and linoleum floor. It does pick up all debris on the carpet.
I was pleasantly surprised how much dog hair this vacuum could efficiently pick up, and how easily it maneuvered around the furniture. It was easy to start and download the app.
it is a great help around the house my wife loves it, believe me it works had it for a couple of months already and have not been able to pair it or down load the app to operate it

Review_title: Too many hairs tangled at corners of brush
Product_review: This is my first robot vacuum, I see the dirt clearly but somehow it misses. The main issue I saw is with tangled hair in the brush. If this hair is in between brush it is easy to clean (comparatively), but all hair is tangled at both corners of the brush. There is much gap between joins at the brush end to joint to the device, that is where the whole hair tangled. It was really pain to clean that hair. Not really sure if that is how all robot vacuums are.
It is so good and deserves to be in every house that cannot afford high end product of the same.

Very loud vacuum. Its super annoying to hear it run while in the room with it. I also have the Eufy G30 and was thinking of getting this for my mom, but couldn't because of how load it is. Other than the noise, everything seems good about it.

Review_title: You pay for what you get
Product_review: You get what you pay for. It‚Äôs nice that it cleans in lines but it leaves sections of rooms untouched before moving to another area. It‚Äôll be an hour before it decides it‚Äôs done cleaning but it never touched the center section of the living room and completely missed the kitchen which are the highest trafficked areas. I pick it up and move it to where I need it to clean and it ends up going back down the hall. Super frustrating. But when it does go over the areas it cleans pretty well. So average but happy with the price ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

We love our little robot. Of course we named him. Schwifty. (Rick and Morty fans will appreciate) he does a great job of picking up debris. He even leaves pretty vaccum lines in the carpet. The only thing we find a bit amusing is that he cleans on an angle. He is consist with his angle. He is also very good at getting into and out of tricky places. We would recommend for sure.

This little vacuum has been amazing! Sometimes it has trouble getting back to the dock but overall was worth the money. We have 4 dogs, 6 potbelly pigs, 5 cats and 4 kids and this thing keeps the floor so much cleaner

I have 2 toddlers and a dog and this vacuum has been my life saver. I put her 2 times per day, sometimes 3. It helps a lot with the left over food and most important with all my dog hair! I‚Äôm very pleased. Moping sucks I don‚Äôt really use it. But the vacuum is great!

Review_title: Was okay at first but not worth it
Product_review: This vacuum was great for a while. I have now had it for a few months and feel like I wasted my money. It dies quickly, without even finishing the main living area. It constantly gets hung every 5 minutes or so, even when it is in the middle of the floor with nothing around it. There is no point in me using a robot vacuum if I have to move it every few minutes.

Review_title: If only I can connect this vacuum to the App
Product_review: I have done everything in the world to try to connect to Wifi - still wouldn't connect. I am using all compatible equipment, and spent about 3 hours trying to make the vacuum work. I moved the vacuum next to my fast router, and still vacuum would not connect to wife. Frustrating, I'm about to return.

Review_title: Paid full price for a used product... :(
Product_review: I recently purchased this Roborock E4. After using it for the first time (for 20 min), It looks like its been used before and returned (shown in app screen shot). Aside from that, it works fine. The suction is strong, maneuvers around kitchen/chair legs very well and it goes over rugs and somehow managed to deal with the tassels on it.

Definitely happy with this purchase. I have a one story house and its perfect. Only thing I don't like is in the app you can only do things in metric measurements instead of customary. Other than that the vacuum is great
It only surface cleans carpets, which means we have to follow up with our Shark vacuum to make sure the carpets are clean enough for our Grandchildren to play and crawl on.

So I was skeptical at first.. but Holy moly! This little guy, which we have named Mitchell, rocked it out on his first run! We just moved in.. and still getting things cleaned up..we have two cats that shed a lot, and as you can see from the pic, it did wonderfully! And I just vacuumed a few days ago too! The only thing I would not rate highly was the inability to connect to the wifi and phone app.. but I'm ok not having extra apps keep tabs on me lol. You definitely won't be disappointed!

Review_title: Great product missing a little customized functionality
Product_review: Honestly, I returned the item but not for its lack of ability to clean..... this thing functions great and is probably way smarter than your average would be buyer thinks. The only reason I returned is the lack of ability to set digital barriers or no go zones and the mopping is virtually useless. If you have a just reasonably uncluttered household I think you‚Äôll be very pleased with this little guy.

Compramos primero 1 aspiradora para ensayarla en el apartamento que tiene alfombra de pelo medio. No le compramos el mop option. Es espectacular saca todo, incluso el polvillo que no se ve. Es Tan buena que decidimos comprar otra para regalarle a mi madre que tiene mascotas. El √∫nico pero es que se enreda un poco en la alfombra, pero es relativamente f√°cil de sacar., tambi√©n se pierde para devolverse sola a su puesto. La bater√≠a dura un promedio de dos horas aspirando zonas de piso y alfombras. Nos a encantado.

Review_title: It works great if you can connect to the app
Product_review: Downloaded the app and tried to connect to the E4 and it won't connect no matter what i do. Tried the instructions, resetting the E4, resetting my phone and re installed the app and all possible ways but really won't connect. I'm sure my phone and the E4 is on the same Wifi network and using 2.4GHz band. Too bad that i have to return it back.

Review_title: I initially received a used one so Roborock gave me a discount on a replacement
Product_review: Update on the below. Roborock Customer Service contacted me to apologize and let me know that Amazon controls both new and used inventory. Regardless, Roborock offered me a discount, if I ordered another. I did order another and it arrived in perfect condition.
For a little over $200, this robovac does everything we need it to do and nothing we don't. It may not be the fastest cleaning robot because it doesn't have LIDAR navigation or room-mapaSZ
I love it. I had one before. When that one went out of order, I decided to order the same brand. The price and the quality are excellent. It‚Äôs my little helper around the house

Review_title: Works for a bit and then will not connect to wifi - picked up cat hair great when it worked
Product_review: Initially I loved this product. However, after 5 months it would no longer connect to our wifi. Called customer service and did not get any where with them. Had to manually start it and I preferred to have it on the schedule, which no longer worked once the wifi connection quit working. Now the wheel has broken and I can't locate how to replace that part. Spend the extra and get a better quality one.

Review_title: Es una gran experiencia tener √©ste robot aspiradora
Product_review: Sufro de la espalda y para mi ha sido una maravilla. Es la segunda que compro y la atenci√≥n al cliente es excelente. Se me rompi√≥ una ruedita y me la mandaron de inmediato. Controlas por la App el la succi√≥n y tiene mopa. En la casa la amamo. Varias amigas la han comprado despu√©s de recomendarla

The vacuum works better than expected. However this model does NOT come with the dustbin advertised, so the first time you go to empty the vacuum you will end up breaking the Dustbin following all of Roborocks tutorials for this model. I would not have purchased this model had I known it makes the cleaning very messy.

Got a good deal on Black Friday but would have paid more for it if necessary. Works really good on my tile floors. Has gotten stuck under kitchen cabinet bottom edge. I pick up chairs and rugs for it do do a through job.

I love my Roborock vacuum! I named it Harry. It‚Äôs unbelievable how much dog hair and dirt he picks up. My only complaint is sometimes he spends too much time in 1 area and runs out of battery before he finishes.

It‚Äôs ok, not as good as a regular vacuum, it suctions surface dirt. My dirt container doesn‚Äôt open, I have to take the filter out to empty, kinda nasty having to touch the dirt. Not sure if that‚Äôs a design flaw or if I got one that doesn‚Äôt work properly.

Review_title: Don‚Äôt buy it! No app to support it!
Product_review: This product is useless and cannot be paired to the app because the app only supports more expensive ‚ÄúS‚Äù series. It will not pair. What a rip off. I‚Äôm returning it.

Absolutely cannot say enough good things about this. It tells you if it‚Äôs charging, connects to your phone... cleaned our house for 2.5 hours before the battery needed to be charged and I didn‚Äôt have to stop one time to fix it

Review_title: I am so happy whit this robot after trying so many and send them but this one is a kepper
Product_review: I have tri so many robot that mop and bacum that house nothing has work they live to much water and that floors and make thing worse but I am so happy excited whit this robot is fant√°stico you can manege that water that goes on that flor realy bacum y mop that house. I depend recoment this robot ifyou are a fan√°ticos whit clean like me you are going to love this robot

Review_title: It's a good buy for the price.
Product_review: For the price I paid it as a really good job. It's not particularly quiet but it usually vacuums the whole house twice for returns to charge. It's short enough to get under most everything and sometimes it'll close the door on itself but it's easy to find and so far it doesn't require a lot of maintenance.
Work‚Äôs great. Easy to start out of the box. Couldn‚Äôt be happier with how it gets around the entire house and picks up tons of dog hair. Rarely break out the regular vacuum anymore.
Had it for a month and I use it daily
It works. Needs to be on high power to get the job done on vinyl flooring. Misses obvious debris.

The vac would not pic up small pieces of toilet paper i put out to test. Even after it went over it several times it missed it. It missed whole rooms and said cleaning was completed. It could not find the charging dock. I read good reviews but was very disappointed. I'm not convinced these robovacs are any good. I returned to amazon. Also i started sneezing alot when it was running like it wasn't filtering the exhaust air.

Honest I feel bad. Why did I not get one of these years ago! This is awesome and is getting in all the tough spots to help make the house cleaner. We no longer wake up with stuffy noses and the air smells so fresh. Working well on hardwood and tile as well as some rugs!

Review_title: Decent vacuum . Does not work with Alexa
Product_review: I bought this on prime day and got a decent deal on this unit. Outside of cleaning and mopping one of the main features we were looking for was the integration with Alexa. So far I have not been able to get it to work and I‚Äôve seen others have struggled with it as well. Does a decent job vacuuming

App is very difficult to get connected to unit (IOS), then once setup/registered will not connect to vacuum to allow for scheduling. Works just fine for those that don't want any remote control interface.

For the price tag and the fact that it actually maps out a pattern vs bouncing around everywhere makes this a great buy. Highly recommend this one if you dont want to spend $$$$ as much for more expensive units.
This vaccum is amazing. Very happy with the power and time on the battery. Shows me the map on my phone of what has been cleaned. So happy.

I have too much carpet space in the house and this E4 is perfect. Although I don't have pets, it picked up all my crazy long hairs pretty well lol. Love the automation feature as well. I turned it on an hour before I get home every other night.

So thankful I bought this thing! I've always wanted one but couldn't bring myself to spend the money, then I saw this one under $200 as deal of the day. Now that I have one I wish I would've bought a long time ago. If you have a shedding dog you need one! This thing is so amazing. And yes, can it can go between carpet and hardwood with no issues. I had no problem connecting to wifi like some other reviewers said.
I absolutely love my vacuum so much that I bought my so one, he‚Äôs loves his as much as I do! They actually get into the small spaces that I didn‚Äôt think it could

I love the cleaning power of the machine, however, I've only had it since November. It has done a good job up until the past 2 weeks. Now everytime it runs I get Error 5 please clean main brush. My brush is clean and so is the surrounding area. It barely makes it 5 feet before it stops and gives the alert. When it works its fabulous but I haven't even had it 6 months and I'm having issues.

Doesn't clean nearly as well as a normal vacuum cleaner, maybe 15-20%. It leaves lines in the floor and gets basic things off the floor so it almost looks vacuumed but if you follow with a regular vacuum cleaner, you see how much is really done. It's only really for visual effects in a room

Love the suction power as well as the mobile use. Having a tough time directing the unit where to travel after cleaning the main area and our master bedroom, needs to travel down a hallway to clean a bedroom and bathroom.

The app is rather frustrating to use - not intuitive or user friendly. Also, pretty frustrating that the robot would continually get stuck under our coffee table rather than mapping it out and just avoiding the underneath part. Alexa integration was basically pointless - it would start the route completely over rather than spot clean.

Review_title: NOT a Roomba; not worth the money.
Product_review: I hated this item. The reviews said it was better than Roomba. No it wasn‚Äôt. All it did was run back and forth in the same area til I manually moved it. This was just a water spreader, but did not clean.

The auction power is decent and i appreciate being able to start it with the Alexa but that all it can do. The remote is tricky to use, but my biggest complaint is the repeated error message after a few months of use and following suggested care guidelines. Wish i could return it
The robot's pathways are not consistent. Could not get the 'App' to work, not sure what I would gain by working to get the app to work. Works good on hardwood flooring, fair on carpet.

I. Freaking. Love. This thing! Named it Kevin. I haven't even bothered to use the app. I turn it on and let it go. I vacuumed really well before the first time I used it and couldn't believe all that it picked up anyway. I have two cats and a dog so pet hair was driving me nuts. Now Kevin vacuums for me every day and my floors are always clean! Has a nice big collection bin that is easy to clean out. Makes me feel kind of like George Jetson, I got a cleaning robot! One of my best purchases ever.

Review_title: Stuck right on the charger and not charging.
Product_review: When it's working it's good, but after one month it start getting issue. It returns home but charging not started. So until you find out and manually put it back, it just stays there. happened three times already. To bad it's out of the return window.

Review_title: Best robovac ever. Lovely app. Buy it
Product_review: ¬†Love it. Our cats not so much ;p. Highly recommend. Easy to empty out dust bin. App is easy to use and very helpful.

We have two golden retrievers and three cats do we were looking for something to help with the mess. We started with a Eufy ... what a piece of junk! After we sent the vac back for four replacements in less than a year, I threw up my hands and moved on. This little guy has been amazing; so much so that I bought another. Highly recommend.
This represents my first purchase of a robot. I was skeptical about how well it would transition from saltillo tile to thick carpet; no issues.
Only reason for not giving 5 stars is because I'm not a fan of the disposal feature... its a little difficult compared to the other vacuum I had...but otherwise, it's a great device.

Great lower end robo vacuumm. It doesn‚Äôt have all the bells and whistles but it cleans the floors well and seems to get everything. Only issues is that it has difficulty getting some of the farther flung bedrooms occasionally.

Although the first one was giving random errors and was not following a certain cleaning pattern, replacement works really well. We are happy with its ease of use and how it navigates around the house. Powerful enough to collect most of the particles.

It is amazing to me how much pet hair and dust this picks up! Occasionally it can't find it's way home and randomly gets stuck trying to go under the couch, but I would buy it again without hesitation. It's taken the mundane chore of sweeping and vacuuming away. I

Very disappointed. Since it doesn't have a mapping system it's supposed smart guiding is terrible. It rarely gets all parts of the home clean, sits and spins in place, and if you reset it, it forgets where it is and you just have to dock it. Suction power is good but noise levels are a little high. Setup wasn't easy and you have to keep it connected to wifi 2.4, so if you have wifi 5 or higher it will be challenging.

Review_title: Less work and better cleaning. This is a great product.
Product_review: I loved everything about this vacuum. It has great suction power as well as battery life. I especially like how it can get under the beds and sweep up all the dust and cat hair. I always thought I was a thorough cleaner but I am amazed how much more the robot can do!!!

Review_title: Why did I wait so long?
Product_review: Very impressed with this entry-level robot vac. I was skeptical about buying it but happy I did. Cleans well and learns as it goes. Easy to clean and long battery time. Does a great job picking up dog hair. Recommended
Nice enough, seems to clean well. My only disappointment is I can not connect to it via WiFi because it works off the older 2 ghz pouters not the newer router.

Review_title: Powerful suction. Hepa grabs more than my vacuum
Product_review: Good suction and picks up more than a regular vacuum. It also mops but must bought separately
Worked great at first. Now after the return window has closed it is going crazy. Will no longer go in a straight line and now thinks something is blocking its wheels when there is nothing.

Review_title: Lasted 5 months.  Good while it lasted.
Product_review: I bought this vacuum on Aug 2020. In Jan 2021 it stopped charging. The base charger has always been plugged into a surge protector. It cleaned well while it lasted. But 5 months is too little of a life for the $$, sorry. To be fair, we go through robot vacuums. I‚Äôve had 2 Neato‚Äôs, the Connected and the D5. Both lasted 2 years before having to be replaced. But you could easily replace their batteries. The Roborock is not accommodating in this regard either.

I owned this for a few weeks before I decided to upgrade to the S5. For a budget vacuum, you can‚Äôt beat the E4. It does a great job of picking up my dogs hair and it‚Äôs very efficient at doing so. It did well on hardwood floors and didn‚Äôt spread debris around like other vacuums. Would make a great gift.

Review_title: The concept is good but it‚Äôs frustrating.
Product_review: I like the fact that we can have it run every day on a schedule, however, it keeps disconnecting from our WiFi even though nothing is wrong with our WiFi and that interrupts the schedule. Also, it‚Äôs not the greatest on carpeting. It kept saying it was stuck and I would go check and it was sitting In the middle of our floor with nothing around it. It tends to take a long time to find its way back to the dock.
So far does a good job for surface cleaning but not made for deep cleaning like the rainbow. Better than rumba at picking up dirt and crumbs.

Review_title: This is a ‚Äúbasic b*tch‚Äù robot vaccum...
Product_review: Loud af and the app doesn‚Äôt even do a map of where its been. Can‚Äôt create boundaries or off-limit areas. When I was setting up my account I got a 404 error. Who does that?

Review_title: Very good brand and what a time saver! Great for taller thresholds
Product_review: After a few months of having this vacuum, its been great. Need to have the app though for complete control. Does not come with a remote.

Review_title: Not good at picking up dog hair
Product_review: We got this for dog hair and it leaves like 40 percent of the dog hair on hard floors and 60 percent on carpet. Picture is after two passes. Great at picking up fruit loops, but we don't have a fruit loops problem.

Review_title: Great job on both wood and carpet!
Product_review: My floors have never been cleaner! It just goes and goes. You can hear the power amp up when on the carpet vs the hardwood floor. It is thin enough to get under the bed and tv cabinets etc. Does well in the corners too.

Review_title: Love it! Gets the job done!
Product_review: Have had this for over 3 months now and have been very happy with it. Tried other vacuums, but can really see and feel a difference with this one.
Bought this vacuum hoping it‚Äôd work. Couldn‚Äôt handle regular duty stuff. Had a very hard time navigating around normal furniture and just missed tons of lines due to things like table legs.

Review_title: Battery wouldn‚Äôt recharge after one month
Product_review: This vacuum worked great at first then a month later it stopped taking a charge and won‚Äôt respond.

Review_title: Gets the job done, I guess
Product_review: Relatively noisy but you can schedule to clean while you are gone. Suction power seemed ok, not very impressive but got the job done. App is not very user friendly, also the cleaning pattern is sporadic and not customizable. Decent vacuum overall but if you‚Äôre looking for a more interactive vacuum to map out your floor plan, look elsewhere. However, if you are looking for a slightly above average vacuum to wander aimlessly throughout your home (and mostly vacuum all the floors) then this one will suffice.

I paid almost $200 for this Unit. I cannot Connect to the unit through the app. I have no idea why. It tells you for reasons for not connecting however, none of that applies to me. I had such high hopes.

Love my little buddy! I have the app and have programmed it to go off at night! Love that I can see where it has gone. Wished bumper strips came with it, but whatever.I'm shocked the amount of stuff it picked up from my 2cats 1dog 3 kids. Works better then my mothers high price robo vac.

Starting using this last month, so far it's been great. Move items out of the way for best performance, press the power button and let it go unattended. Came back to a well cleaned aptmt, dumped the container, and looked forward to the next time.

My review come from the fact that when opened it was preused! The rollers, dust pan were full of dirt and tangled hair. I spent full price on a gift for my mother who has cancer to help her out and she has to deal with this. Had I known it would come preused first I wouldn't have spent this price and two I would have bought a different one. Absolutely nasty!!

Three weeks into using this vacuum, and I don‚Äôt know how I lived without it. Great suction. I love the mop function, perfect for a 1,000 sq ft tiled basement! Great to know that my floors will be cleaned while I continue working uninterrupted. A huge time saver. I highly recommend!

Review_title: Definitely Worth it For Pet Hair
Product_review: Wish i would bought this sooner, i run it once a day keeps dog hair down. Better to dump container daily for best suction for dog hair.
I can not even express how much I love this vacuum. It works well, it is not to loud, it even gets under my couch. I know it is helping me have a healthier, less dusty home.

For the price this is an amazing vacuum! Compared to iRobot which my mom has, she says mine is better! It cleans in a pattern instead of sparatically and all over the place like iRobot. You can label the rooms once it learns it‚Äôs pattern. Overall, great buy and I‚Äôm very happy with the purchase!
So far so good! Great suction and battery life. Bobby the robot is my little helper.

I love this vacuum! It does an excellent job. I kind of wish I had but better one that I could map rooms with, but this one works very well. If I have to move it. It does get stuck once in a while, but I just move it.

Review_title: Nice suction & don‚Äôt miss a spot.
Product_review: This is our 3rd robotic Vaccum cleaner. This is one of my favorites! I‚Äôd like to find out about the mop attachment. I‚Äôd be interested in getting that too. This Vaccuum saves us so much time.

Review_title: This thing is amazing with pet hair!
Product_review: Having hardwood/vinyl floors this thing is amazing. Especially with pet hair. We have a husky, so this thing is a life saver. I really can‚Äôt rate it on carpet though.

Review_title: Can handle lots of dog hair!
Product_review: Love my robot vacuum. I had a different brand before this and returned it because it was all over the place and didn‚Äôt go in a pattern. I have two dogs (one golden one short haired mutt) and they shed sooo much and this little vacuum can handle it. It‚Äôs made cleaning so much easier for me. Absolutely love it!

I have it scheduled to clean at 730am, it takes a bit over an hour to do about 1000sqft at the balanced mode.

Don't waste your time. The app doens't work at all. Doesn't link with your phone. What a joke. Downloaded the manual and there is a different app to download and that won't install! Instructions are awful and not detailed on how to use this.

For the price, this can't be beet. It works very well with my golden retriever dog and dark wood floors. It does get stock every once in a while on a carpet or hanging off the stairs

Review_title: Great Vacuum, poor app and initiation. Loud.

Review_title: never have dust on your feet again
Product_review: It wont pick up everytying, but it'll make your feet feel clean every time youre walking on your floors. Theres a huge decrease in dust and allergens in my house too. I got it when it was a bit pricey, but if this goes on sale, it's an immediate purchase. no brainer.

WHY did I not buy this before??! This little vacuum is amazing! I was very hesitant about buying one of these because I have two dogs and a cat...with a doggie door out to the yard. I did not think a robot vacuum would even make a dent on cleanliness...I was so wrong!
This is the best vacuum hands down. The suction power is great and it navigates everywhere. Great on the tile floors and area rugs.
Not enough suction for area rugs, but if you have laminate floors, it's great for helping keep the dust bunny herds under control.

I am very impressed with this. It cleans my whole house without issue. I had a shark before this one and although the shark did a good job, I love that this one does the perimeter anf then a back and forth pattern in each room. No more random. Actually maps out your house and goes along a grid. Other budget robot vacuums just bounce around randomly like a pinball machine. The app is not very good though.

Review_title: Idk bout Alexa but worth the money and love it!

Review_title: Works great right out of the box

Review_title: Vacuums better than it sweeps - this model doesn‚Äôt bring the Moo but u can buy that separately

I purchased a iRobot after all kinds of frustrations with this and they are significantly better and well worth the additional cost. Save the frustrations with buying a very poor product and get something that actually works.

It has excellent suction and reaches all the corners. It cleans vey well. Only negative is that it is VERY hard to connect to WIFI so using the app has been a struggle. I have not been able to set a schedule due to this.
Cheap price on Thanksgiving day but working good. Battery is another fact that I like it. Best on hardwood floor not on carpet. Would recommend to everyone.

Todo me agrada un poco de ruido pero nada insoportable, es una excelente soluci√≥n que todas las mujeres deb√≠an tener para cuidar m√°s de si misma. Estoy muy feliz
You have to babysit otherwise, he will get stuck under the couch, under the dishwasher etc‚Ä¶ save your money!

Review_title: I got ripped off and want a full refund
Product_review: Your application to download will not download to my iOS device to control device
Purchase a cheaper one prior to this and regrets. This was THE BEST buy ever for my home. I have carpet and hardwood floors this machine works GREAT!!

Was not very hard to set up, but it really struggles to not get stuck somewhere and then when I free it up it does not know how to get back to base to recharge. I wish there was a way to view what it has mapped durring its runs so you can edit it and help tell it where to avoid.
Have no idea what is wrong with it. It was working so so for about a month then it went back to the charger after a cleaning and won't turn on again.
My entire house is hardwood floors. I have a chow and a husky and need to vacuum at least once a day to stay on top of the hair, Berta( yes, we named the vacuum ) has been doing a great job!
¬†This thing really amazes me and lessons my duty! Such a great addition. I swept and mopped the floor thoroughly and it still got stuff! Worth the money

Overall, a great product at a great price! üëçüôÇ
Works great on hardwood floors, wouldn‚Äôt recommend for medium/high pile carpet. But other than that it‚Äôs perfect!

Review_title: Best robo cleaner in this price range
Product_review: The product is great, better than the one (another brand) I had before. It maps the floor line by line, and picks up junk really well. Also bought this as XFX to congratulate XiaoZhan as the spokesperson.

Literally cannot live without it. We‚Äôve only had it for about a month but it‚Äôs saved me from having to vacuum a total of 286 times so far LOL. Wish the mop worked better but most likely will just buy a second robot for that. We have 2 toddlers and giant German Shepherd and the vacuum works amazing with all the hair and crumbs.

Review_title: Perfect sidekick for keeping home clean!
Product_review: So far so good! We received our Roborock 3 weeks ago and it‚Äôs been amazing thus far! The dust bin is very easy to remove & empty. The suction must be very powerful because it‚Äôs always collecting even the smallest dust and dirt particles from inbetween wooden floor board indents. Wish we had this sooner! Highly recommend getting one of these. I haven‚Äôt had the opportunity to use the mopping feature yet but looking forward to trying that out as well. I believe I may need to purchase an additional part for that feature.

Review_title: Excelente para la persona que labora fuera √≥ la que no est√° en condici√≥n por salud .
Product_review: Muy bueno para limpieza cont√≠nua y su alcance queda bien limpio. La dejas programada para limpieza, me encant√≥.

The app for the phone is what has been difficult. And the battery seems to run out quickly. We have had the vacuum since October of 2020 and it has done an ok job but we haven't been able to get it to run on specific directions just on the clean mode it hasn't configured our house and memorized rooms or furniture.
Great little machine. Does a wonderful job at cleaning our textured vinyl flooring. So far, no complaints.

I have owned 4 robot vacuums. I always thought my Shark 750 was the best, until now. This Roborock E4 tops all of them. It doesn't get stuck, it always finds it way back home. Most of all it really does suck in a good way.

I would recommend a rumba over this unit and forgo the mop feature for better battery life.

Review_title: Best robot vacuum without LIDAR technology!
Product_review: This is the best robot without LIDAR in my opinion. Love how it cleans in straight lines rather than bouncing around randomly. It knows where it‚Äôs cleaned, so it runs until the cleaning is complete rather than until the battery dies. In fact, I‚Äôve never had the battery die on me yet - the lowest it‚Äôs ever gotten to is 42%. If you have a dog that sheds, you need to get the Roborock E4.

Review_title: Nice gift! My friend is released from housework
Product_review: Quiet, effective in cleaning every corner.

It you don't mine not have all the bells and whistles, and want a very powerful vac with great battery life this is for you. The money you save you can buy one for up stairs and down. Good job Roborock!

Love love it! We use it twice a day and started leaving shoes outside. I use mopping attachment every other day with light water/vinegar/essential oil mixture. Our floors have never been cleaner and it truly lifts the spirits
Mine can't seem to find it's way home. I followed the instructions to the letter, but when I hit "return home" it just goes in circles. Not sure how to fix this.
Would not return to the home base. Tried and tried and got the tech support on the phone and we could not figure it out. Sent it back

I like it‚Äôs cleaning algorithm; our little robot scuttled back and forth in a zig-zag pattern that covers the entire floor pretty well. I can use the app anywhere to initiate cleanup, though I can only use other remote functions (spot cleaning, steering) when I share WiFi.
Don‚Äôt get this. The algorithm is terrible it doesn‚Äôt figure out a room in an open space

Review_title: Great pickup, long batter life...so far very happy!
Product_review: Saving my life so to speak as far as vacuuming! Big vacuumshurt my back & my old robo version gave out. Needed a reasonable priced version. This one works GREAT!

Review_title: So far so good. Too thick to commit suicide by going under the railing.
Product_review: Decent vacuum. My previous one from eufy fell down the stairs despite advertising that it wouldn't. This one also does a better job vacuuming.

It picked up really well but the quiet mode didn‚Äôt work on ours so it was really loud. It also frequently wouldn‚Äôt dock because it couldn‚Äôt find it. It also frequently would get turned around so it would vacuum the same section over and over again. Had to return it.

Review_title: Pleased with Battery Life and Vacuum Operations.
Product_review: Only issue is there is little to No information on downloading suitable software (several available) and never have been able to make ROOM Function operate. No good instruction manual or tips and No trouble shooting assistance. However overall were pleased with basic features.
I returned this robotic vac just didn't work good for me. It would get lost and not return to charger.
I LOVE this product!! So easy to use and has great suction! I have a lot of pet hair and running this helps keep it down!
¬†I am in love with it. The best part is that it doesn‚Äôt tumble downstairs ü•∞

The large gaps on the sides involving the front bumper "hooked" up too often on wood furniture such as chair legs while turning in place. This hooking caused it to jump and thump way to often. Also ran into darker colored furniture without slowing down first.

Review_title: Not what I was hoping for

When I tried to move the docking station the adhesive that held the plastic ring to the floor under the dock lifted off a layer of hardwood.

Love how it cleans corners and baseboards. Much easier to clean out dust tray. Noise level is a little higher than my last robot but I love this one.

Review_title: works so well but came full of someone else's dirt!
Product_review: I know it was a used Amazon warehouse deal, however I didn't expect it to come with the dust bin literally full of someone else's dirt! Come on you have to do better than that Amazon!
This is a great Vacuum, I love it. Works great around the house without any problem, I really recommend it to everyone.

We love our Roborock vacuum. This is our first robot vacuum but will definitely not be our last. Would highly recommend this purchase to anyone and would be happy to purchase from Roborock again.
The vacuum wouldn't work with the app, wouldn't connect to my Wi-Fi. The vacuum still works without it, but minus all the features.

I had an off shoot robotic vacuum that lasted 3 years - it could not adjust from hard wood to carpet , this does easily. My other had no idea where it was going most of the time . This one has the room lay out perfect. It works great with Alexa. ‚ÄúAlexa turn on robot ‚Äú off it goes to complete its cleaning ! Love it
Love everything about this little thing especially that it can vacuum instead of me. Actually it does better job than myself.

Review_title: A hands free attention sucking vacuum
Product_review: If you can't baby sit it, don't buy it. It's faster and more efficient to use your old push vaccuum. Save your money.
It's a great product for the price. I've had another one different brand which died when my nephew sat on it. I had to get a new one and this one is tough and very efficient.

I am very pleased with my new ROBOROCK E4. After investigating various brand in a similar price range and decided to try Roborock.
